message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_NAME
message.locale: Name is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROGRAM_ITEM_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this Screening as links to Program Items exist.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICATION_CATEGORY_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this Screening as links to Online Categories exist.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_IN_USE
message.locale: The name %1s is already in use as a Screening name.

message.name: ERR_XRV_QUESTION_SCRIPT_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Question Script, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SCHEMA_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Schema, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_FILTER_QUESTION_SCRIPT_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Filter Question Script, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_FILTER_SCHEMA_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Filter Schema, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_RULESET_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Ruleset, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_FILTER_RULESET_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Filter Ruleset, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ELIGIBILITY_SCHEMA_SELECT
message.locale: A Schema must be selected if a Question Script has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FILTER_SCHEMA_SELECT
message.locale: A Filter Schema must be selected if a Filter Question Script has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ELIGIBILITY_SCRIPT_SELECT
message.locale: A Schema must be associated with a Question Script.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FILTER_SCRIPT_SELECT
message.locale: A Filter Schema must be associated with a Filter Question Script.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FILTER_SCRIPT_SAME_AS_ELIGIBILITY_SCRIPT
message.locale: The same IEG Script must not be used as both the Filter Question Script and the Question Script.

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_IEG_SCRIPT_USED_AS_SCREENING_SCRIPT
message.locale: The IEG Script can not be removed as it is used as a Screening script by the Screening Type [%1s].

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_IEG_SCRIPT_USED_AS_FILTER_SCRIPT
message.locale: The IEG Script can not be removed as it is used as a Filtered Screening script by the Screening Type [%1s].

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_GROUP_HAS_NO_PROGRAM_TYPES
message.locale: The program group %1s cannot be added because it does not have any associated Programs.

message.name: ERR_NO_ELIGIBILITY_RULE_SET_SPECIFIED
message.locale: No rule set has been specified for full eligibility for this Screening Type.

message.name: ERR_NO_FILTER_RULE_SET_SPECIFIED
message.locale: No rule set has been specified for filter screening for this Screening Type.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_RULE_SET_REUSE_NOT_ENABLED
message.locale: As screening rule set reuse has not been enabled, you cannot specify the same rule set for both full screening and filter screening. Please contact your administrator or choose different rule sets.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_REUSE_NOT_ENABLED_RULE_SET_ALREADY_USED
message.locale: Rule set '%1s' cannot be used as it us used by the '%2s' screening. Please contact your administrator to enable screening rule set reuse if required.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FILTER_RULE_SET_ALONE
message.locale: A Filter Question Script and Filter Schema must be specified if a Filter Ruleset is specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered for '%1s' is too long (%2s), maximum allowed is %3s.
